EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email invitation template for survey: 2013 Sales Compensation
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Timba Surveys] 2013 Sales Compensation
EmailTemplate.subject: Deadline Today - Please complete this survey: 2013 Sales Compensation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Compensation Questionnaire:
Please help us gain insight on PGi's sales compensation plans by taking part in this survey below. We are interested in your opinions about what motivates your selling behavior. Be assured that all answers you provide will be kept strictly confidential. This survey is available now through Tuesday, October 29, 2013.
Thank you in advance for providing your input.
Sales Operations.
Please complete this survey at: http://pgi.force.com/timbasurvey/timbasurveys__survey?id=a2Aa00000004dT8EAI&r=a23a00000000wlFAAQ
